com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation.widget

Interface DynamicListView.OnItemMovedListener

  • Enclosing class:
    DynamicListView

    public static interface DynamicListView.OnItemMovedListener
    Implement this interface to be notified of ordering changes. Call #setOnItemMovedListener(com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation.widget.DynamicListView .OnItemMovedListener).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onItemMoved(int newPosition)
      Called after an item is dropped and moved.

    • Method Detail

      • onItemMoved

        void onItemMoved(int newPosition)
        Called after an item is dropped and moved.
        Parameters:
        newPosition - the new position of the item.
